title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API.

title: chatbox
summary: Cross-platform desktop chat client that supports Ollama, OpenAI, Claude, etc.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-compatible server for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function-calling and deployment patterns.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Experimental NestJS module providing decorators and services for Ollama.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for chatting with Ollama from mobile or desktop apps.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside your notes.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama, LangChain and Chroma in a single Docker Compose.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes an OpenAI-compatible chat endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama.
